content: Drop down here, and head right first to collect the Fire Date from the tree. Then go in the opposite direction toward the lava streaming from the ceiling. This is where you can find one of the optional bosses in Chapter 5, the Flint Chief.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Flint_Chief.md', within the main section titled 'Flint Chief', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Flint Chief'.
The content is as follows:
Drop down here, and head right first to collect the Fire Date from the tree. Then go in the opposite direction toward the lava streaming from the ceiling. This is where you can find one of the optional bosses in Chapter 5, the Flint Chief.
